description:
Running tubeless saves you weight, eliminates the chance of pinch-flats, and gives you more traction. MEC Tubeless Sealant is quick sealing and easy to install, giving you more time to ride.

  • Seals punctures up to 8mm on MTB tires and up to 6mm on road tires
  • Stays liquid in your tires for 2-7 months (regular riding can extend this)
  • Biodegradable water based solution does not contain latex or ammonia
  • Works down to -15°C
  • Needed volume per tire (approximately): road tires – 23-28C = 40-70ml, gravel tires – 30-45C = 70-80ml, MTB – 27.5/29in. and 2.35-2.6in. = 120-150ml, fat bike – 3-4in. = 250ml. If a tire has never ran tubeless before, add an extra 10ml for an improved seal
name: MEC Tubeless Tire Sealant
